issue.title: [Doc] Java Cookbook Release 1
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-14553](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14553). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
JAVA Recipes regarding the core sections of the Cookbook document ( <https://docs.google.com/document/d/1v-jK_9osnLvAnAjLOM_frgzakjFhLpUi8OC0MlKpxzw/edit#> )
 \* Reading and Writing Data
 \* Creating Arrow Objects

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14553?focusedCommentId=17449219) by Antoine Pitrou (apitrou):*
`[~dsusanibara]`   Please try to format the title and register appropriate components for all issues you create :) It makes navigating through them much easier!

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14553?focusedCommentId=17477262) by Krisztian Szucs (kszucs):*
Postponing this umbrella issue to 8.0
